properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 8 at 7:36AM CST until February 9 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the
following rivers in Middle Tennessee...

Duck River At Columbia affecting Maury County

. The Duck River has dropped below flood stage but remains above action stage
therefore the flood warning has been replaced with an advisory. The river should
continue to fall this weekend with the break in the rain, but more rain will move
into the area early Monday morning which could lead to additional rises on the Duck
River.

The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Duck River At Columbia
* At 06AM Saturday the stage was 31.8 feet and falling.
* Action stage is 28.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 32.0 feet.
* The river will continue to fall to near 23.6 feet by tomorrow morning.
* At 32.0 feet...Flood waters overflow the banks and low lying areas near
Columbia begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or other local media for further information
from the National Weather Service.
